info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of payments and transfers
info.title: Order Payments APIs

parameters.description: Transaction reference identifier.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Indicates the direction of the Direct debit claim for which mandate is received. The claim can be 'Outward' i.e. Claim is sent to the other bank or 'Inward'  i.e. other bank submit their claim to debit our customer's account.

parameters.name: paymentCurrency
parameters.description: This field holds the transaction currency or currency in which payment is initiated.

parameters.name: debitCustomerId
parameters.description: Debtor customer details

parameters.name: creditCustomerId
parameters.description: Creditor customer id details

parameters.name: debitCurrency
parameters.description: Currency of the debit account. For example: USD, EUR etc.

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

parameters.description: Indicates the direction of the Direct debit claim for which mandate is received. The claim can be 'Outward' i.e. Claim is sent to the other bank or 'Inward'  i.e. other bank submit their claim to debit our customer's account.

parameters.name: transactionCurrency
parameters.description: Indicates the currency of the transaction. For example GBP, USD etc.

parameters.name: transactionAmount
parameters.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

parameters.name: debitCurrencyId
parameters.description: The currency of the debit side in payment transaction.

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

parameters.name: creditCurrencyId
parameters.description: Specifies the credit currency. For example: USD, EUR etc.

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

parameters.name: sendersReference
parameters.description: Indicates the incoming sender's reference i.e. tag 20 of incoming SWIFT or in case when transaction is received from other system/ application, this can also indicate the reference number of that system/ application

parameters.description: Indicates the end to end reference for the payment. This field can be provided by the person who instructs the payment and this flows through the lifecycle of the payment.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

feeType.description: Indicates the type of fee which is applied for payment instruction

feeName.description: Indicates the description for type of fee which is applied for payment instruction

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

feeCurrency.description: Indicates the fee currency in which fee amount is applied for the payment instruction

feeAmount.description: Indicates the fee amount which is applied for the payment instruction

chargeCurrency.description: Indicates the currency code of the charge account from where the fee is deducted

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order. For example: BEN(All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR(All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA(Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

eventName.description: The name that is displayed for the event

errorCode.description: Indicates the error code which is encountered during payment processing as returned by payment system

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context

dateTime.description: Contains the date and time separated by '-'

currency.description: Indicates the type of currency to which the account belongs

direction.description: Indicates the direction of the Direct debit claim for which mandate is received. The claim can be 'Outward' i.e. Claim is sent to the other bank or 'Inward'  i.e. other bank submit their claim to debit our customer's account.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

date.description: Indicates the date on which activity was performed

customerReference.description: The reference which is provided to the beneficiary/ creditor by the originator of payment

sendersReference.description: Indicates the incoming sender's reference i.e. tag 20 of incoming SWIFT or in case when transaction is received from other system/ application, this can also indicate the reference number of that system/ application

paymentStatus.description: Describes the current status of the payment order in the payment system

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

receivedAt.description: Indicates the date and time when the record was created in DD MON YYYY HH:MM:SS.MMM format

transactionCurrency.description: Indicates the currency of the transaction. For example GBP, USD etc.

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

paymentSource.description: Indicates the source from where the payment is originated

paymentDirection.description: Indicates the direction of payment i.e. incoming, outgoing, book or redirect

paymentType.description: Indicates if the payment is Customer (C) type or Bank (B) type

paymentId.description: Indicates the unique reference number of the payment

cutOffTime.description: The Cut off time when all executions for the day are consolidated to create a trade

currency.description: Indicates the type of currency to which the account belongs

ZERONORECORDS.description: zero records display for NOFILE (an enquiry does not exist in a single file) enquiry for online upgrade
zero records display for NOFILE (an enquiry does not exist in a single file) enquiry for online upgrade

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

processingDate.description: The date when payment instruction is processed in system.

relatedReference.description: An external reference id for the transaction.

product.description: Indicates an id or name of a product

paymentDirection.description: Indicates the direction of payment i.e. incoming, outgoing, book or redirect

transactionCurrency.description: Indicates the currency of the transaction. For example GBP, USD etc.

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

instructedAmount.description: Specifies the amount which is allocated or instructed for the account reference included in the selection for a specific transaction.

chargeOption.description: This field will hold the charge applicable for the order

beneficiaryID.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored
